random.li: Is your ass jealous of the amount of shit that just came out of your mouth?
If I wanted to kill myself I'd climb your ego and jump to your IQ.
Two wrongs don't make a right, take your parents as an example.
I don't engage in mental combat with the unarmed.
I'd like to see things from your point of view but I can't seem to get my head that far up my ass.
Your family tree must be a cactus because everybody on it is a prick.
It's better to let someone think you are an Idiot than to open your mouth and prove it.
Yo're so ugly, when your mom dropped you off at school she got a fine for littering.
Your birth certificate is an apology letter from the condom factory.
If laughter is the best medicine, your face must be curing the world.
You must have been born on a highway because that's where most accidents happen.
It looks like your face caught on fire and someone tried to put it out with a hammer.
The only way you'll ever get laid is if you crawl up a chicken's ass and wait.
I wasn't born with enough middle fingers to let you know how I feel about you.
If ignorance is bliss, you must be the happiest person on earth.
If you really want to know about mistakes, you should ask your parents.
I'm jealous of all the people that haven't met you!
Hey, you have something on your chin... no, the 3rd one down.
You are proof that evolution CAN go in reverse.
If I had a face like yours, I'd sue my parents.
What language are you speaking? Cause it sounds like bullshit.
Don't you love nature, despite what it did to you?
So, a thought crossed your mind? Must have been a long and lonely journey.
You're the reason the gene pool needs a lifeguard.
You're so fake, Barbie is jealous.
I would love to insult you... but that would be beyond the level of your intelligence.
Aha, I see the Fuck-Up Fairy has visited us again!
I don't think you are stupid. You just have a bad luck when thinking.
I would ask you how old you are but I know you can't count that high.
As an outsider, what do you think of the human race?
I'm glad to see you're not letting your education get in the way of your ignorance.
I don't know what makes you so stupid, but it really works.
Hell is wallpapered with all your deleted selfies.
You're so ugly, you scared the crap out of the toilet.
I don't know what your problem is, but I'll bet it's hard to pronounce.
I love what you've done with your hair. How do you get it to come out of the nostrils like that?
How many times do I have to flush before you go away?
You're like school in the summertime - no class.
You're about as useless as an asshole with tastebuds.
Oh, what? Sorry. I was trying to imagine you with a personality.
If bullshit could float...you'd be the Admiral of the fleet!
Shut up, you'll never be the man your mother is.
You sound reasonable. It must be time to up my medication!
You've got two brain cells: one is in a wheelchair and the other one is pushing.
If shit was music, you'd be an orchestra.
If your going to be two faced at least make one of them pretty.
You look like a before picture.
You are not as bad as people say, you are much, much worse.
You have the perfect face for radio.
Whatever kind of look you were going for, you missed.
Your gene pool could use a little chlorine.
If I had a dollar for every time you said something smart, I'd be broke.
Aww, it's so cute when you try to talk about things you don't understand.
Save your breath... You'll need it to blow up your date.
I've seen people like you, but I had to pay admission!
Did your parents keep the placenta and throw away the baby?
You're street smart. Sesame Street smart.
When I look into your eyes, I see straight through to the back of your head.
I'm already visualising the duct tape across your mouth.
Are you always this stupid or is today a special occasion?
Your family is just a few clowns short of a circus.
Are your parents siblings?
You're as sharp as a bowling ball.
You look like something I drew with my left hand.
If my dog had a face like yours I would shave his ass and walk him backwards.
You have the right to remain silent because whatever you say will probably be stupid anyway.
You're so sad that even Bob the Builder can't fix your life.
You're so ugly, even Hello Kitty says goodbye.
I can't believe that you were the sperm that won the race, and your still slow.
You are not even beneath my contempt.
You look like a person that would exchange one of their chromosomes for a Big Mac.
Idiot college called, they want their mascot back.
Such a little man, such a drama queen.
You look like the grinch with plastic surgery gone wrong!
You would never be able to live down to your reputation, but I see you're doing your best.
You're about as useful as a bucket without a bottom.
Your so dense, light must bend around you.
You better hope you marry rich.
Looking at you, I understand why some animals eat their young.
It's like someone took all the bad traits from steve Buschemi and adam Sandler to make your face.
You look like you suck dick for meth and call yourself gay so you sleep better at night.
Please point to the spot on this doll where the priest touched you.
9 out of 10 dentists would recommend suicide.
Your snapchat feed looks like a gender reasignment progression track.
You have the kind of looks that makes people talk about your charming personality.
You look like a model from antidepressant commercial.
I bet you're not allowed within a mile of a school zone.
Tell me, how does the local football team taste?
You should become anorectic, then at least there's less of you to be ashamed of.
You look like you're on the brink of discovering fire.
I'd give it half a second before I swipe left.
Looks like you still have the marks on your forehead from your parents' little coathanger experiment.
You look like a ventriloquist dummy used to teach kids the side effects of incest.
Look at the bright side, your slowly creeping alcoholism will bring your lifespan nicely below the national average.
One night stands are most likely your forte.
